description:
Protecting The Rights And Freedom Of The Accused Across Rhode Island
When facing charges or accusations of any type of criminal offense, you are likely frightened and uncertain as to what your future holds. Considering that any conviction will have serious, long-term effects on your life, you deserve the best legal representation on your side to help you fight the charges against you and mitigate any potential impact on your future.
With multiple offices across Rhode Island, Marin and Barrett, Inc., offers convenient access to the highest level of advocacy possible to individuals dealing with serious legal challenges. We have nearly a decade of experience helping people just like you protect their rights and freedoms.
From our law office in Newport, we serve clients throughout Newport County and the surrounding areas. We promise to work closely with you to offer the sound advice you need to make the best informed decisions about the matters that affect your case.
Top-Notch Counsel And Aggressive Advocacy From A Local Attorney
Our law firm's founder, attorney Matthew Marin, is a local attorney who has developed strong, long-standing relationships with many of the prosecutors, judges and other legal professionals in our criminal justice system. Our law firm has earned a reputation across our region for delivering customized, effective defense strategies that get results.
For experienced, aggressive representation from a legal advocate devoted to helping you achieve the most favorable outcome for your serious situation, look no further than Marin and Barrett, Inc. Our law firm offers free initial consultations, so you can contact us to begin the process of fighting the charges you face to have the best odds possible for securing a brighter future.
